item.title: January Summary
item.description:
Happy New Year Indies! Here's what happened this month:

The Global Game Jam is taking place January 20-22; there's still time to get in if you're interested.

Hawken King presented a game made for the Nintendo Disk System!! He created a cartridge based on the soundtrack for his recently released game, Pirate Pop Plus.

Martin from Ninja Egg presented Kyub, their action puzzle game available on XBox One and Windows. Using the power of elements and your brain you have to guide a cube through a series of bizarre and beautiful environments.

Ryosuke Mihara talked about the Pico-8 Tiny TV Jam, in progress until the 22nd.

That was all this month, catch you next time!
item.dc:creator: Team Tokyo Indies

item.title: TI 2016 12月
item.description:
今月のプレゼンした方は下記通りになりました。

  • A-san
  • BB-san
  • CCC

プレゼンの皆様、お疲れ様でした！
item.dc:creator: Team Tokyo Indies

item.title: プレゼンの申し込み
item.description:
Tokyo Indiesは常にプレゼンターを募集しています。開発中の作品でも大歓迎なのでお気軽にご応募ください。

プレゼンテーションについて

  • プレゼンは20時ごろから始まります
  • プレゼンは10分程度でお願いします
  • プレゼンには基本各自のPCをご利用ください

応募フォームはこちら。
item.dc:creator: Team Tokyo Indies

item.title: About
item.description:
Tokyo Indies is an event for Indies in Tokyo.

Tokyo Indies is a monthly gathering where game developers, creators, artists and game fans can hang out and share their passion for games over a few (or more) friendly drinks. No matter your calling, be you indie, doujin, student, corporate or wookiee, whether you love making games or just playing them. All are welcome! We offer time and space to present your games or just display them for feedback and from time to time we will host unique speakers and guests.
item.dc:creator: Team Tokyo Indies

item.title: アクセス
item.description: Tokyo Indiesは渋谷のFab Cafeの2FにあるMTRLに開催されます。
